Luke

According to the limited inerrancy belief

choices.answer: The Bible is full of mistakes since it is so old

choices.answer: The sun was created on day 4, but day and night on day 1
God is called "God" in chap 1, but "Lord God" in chap 2
The universe was created in six days
God doesn't really have to rest if he is all powerful
God literally created the universe in 6 days
We don't know how long it took God to create the universe
A person should not look for scientific facts in the Bible
The universe is billions of years old

The author thought each day represented a million years

questions.question: According to the limited inerrancy view, why does the author refer to creation in 6 days?

choices.answer: God making humans in his image
Giving human characteristics to God
The belief that God is beyond human language
The belief that Jesus is the human form of God
